main event: A brief UFO sighting of an amber object approximately 20Â° above the horizon east of Cape Canaveral.
interesting points: The object was observed to move rapidly and changed direction abruptly., The sighting lasted for about 2 minutes, with 30 seconds of observation., The object was circular in shape and emitted no sound or visible trail., Five crew members witnessed the event and confirmed its details., Various conclusions were drawn including that it could have been a balloon or aircraft.
